HERO.TITLE: Hexydog (HEXY): Empowering Pet Care Through Blockchain Technology
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Transforming pet care with crypto innovation, Hexydog (HEXY) brings real-world utility to the global pet sector. By enabling crypto payments at pet stores and supporting transparent donations for animal welfare, it stands out as the best crypto presale of 2025 with a clear purpose and lasting impact.

ABOUT.TITLE: About HEXYDOG
ABOUT.SUBTITLE: Where Crypto Meets Compassion
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH: At Hexydog, we're redefining the crypto space by building a real-world connection between digital assets and animal welfare. Our platform pairs purposeful tokenomics with direct support for animal shelters and rescue organizations around the world. Through partnerships with pet stores, HEXY tokens can be used for seamless purchases of pet products, services, and accessories. This brings practical utility to the heart of the pet industry. Join the Hexydog presale today and be part of a movement that delivers meaningful impact for animals in need.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.SUBTITLE: Advancing Animal Welfare Through Blockchain
MISSION.PARAGRAPH: Hexydog bridges the gap between cryptocurrency and animal welfare, delivering lasting impact through practical, purpose-driven solutions.

MISSIONS.TITLE: Integrating Crypto with the Pet Industry
MISSIONS.DESCRIPTION: Leveraging blockchain technology to support global animal welfare, HEXY tokens will enable seamless crypto payments at partnered pet stores.

MISSIONS.TITLE: Transparent Giving
MISSIONS.DESCRIPTION: Animal shelters and rescue organizations receive direct support through blockchain-verified donations, ensuring accountability and trust.

MISSIONS.TITLE: Rewarding Compassion
MISSIONS.DESCRIPTION: HEXY creates value for holders while actively supporting real-world animal welfare initiatives.

ROADMAP.TITLE: Our Roadmap
ROADMAP.TEXT: HEXYDOG's journey to create a lasting impact on animal welfare.

PHASES.TITLE: Phase 1
PHASES.SUBTITLE: Foundation
LIST: Deploy HEXY smart contract with third-party audit
Complete KYC verification and implement security protocols
Launch official website and whitepaper
Community-building on social platforms
Launch initial marketing and awareness efforts

PHASES.TITLE: Phase 2
PHASES.SUBTITLE: Growth and Transparency
LIST: Expand community and social growth initiatives
Launch global Hexy Ambassador Program
Build strategic partnerships with pet-related businesses and NGOs
Secure Tier 1 exchange listing commitments
Finalize staking mechanics and donation system structure

PHASES.TITLE: Phase 3
PHASES.SUBTITLE: Utility and Launch
LIST: Launch HEXY token on decentralized exchanges
Centralized exchange (CEX) listings
Enable on-chain donations to verified shelters
Expand pet sector and animal welfare partnerships
Launch HexyPay for crypto payments at pet stores
Introduce DAO-based community governance

PHASES.TITLE: Phase 4
PHASES.SUBTITLE: Expansion
LIST: Scale HexyPay across international pet retailers
Grow partnerships with global animal welfare organizations
Launch automated donations and payment tracking features
Boost brand presence through strategic collaborations
Strengthen community leadership and long-term governance

FEATURES.TITLE: Hexy Rescue Fund
FEATURES.DESCRIPTION: Every transaction contributes to pet rescues, shelters, and animal welfare initiatives globally.

FEATURES.TITLE: Transparent Operations

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: What is the HEXY token?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: HEXY is the native token of the HEXYDOG ecosystem, combining cryptocurrency innovation with animal welfare support. It enables participation in our community governance, staking rewards, and direct support for animal shelters worldwide.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: How do I purchase HEXY tokens?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: To participate in the presale, connect your Ethereum wallet to our platform and use ETH to purchase HEXY tokens. The minimum purchase amount will be specified during the presale period.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: How does the Hexy Rescue Fund work?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: The Hexy Rescue Fund allocates 5% of presale funds to support animal shelters and rescue organizations. Token holders can vote on recipient organizations, and all donations are verified through smart contracts for complete transparency.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: What are the benefits of staking HEXY?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: Staking HEXY tokens provides rewards in additional tokens, exclusive NFTs, and potential discounts with our pet industry partners while supporting our animal welfare initiatives.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: How can I become a Hexy Ambassador?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: The Hexy Ambassador program is open to community members who want to help coordinate local shelter support. Applications will be available through our website, and selected ambassadors will help manage regional initiatives.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: When do I receive my presale HEXY tokens?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: After completing your presale purchase, you can use the same wallet to claim your $HEXY tokens at launch. The claim and listing dates will be shared on our social media channels.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: How do I know that presale is secure?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: HEXYDOG ensures maximum security through KYC verification of the team and a robust security system, including smart contract audits and anti-rug measures. Transparency and trust are our priorities, making your investment in the presale safe and reliable.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: How do I see my purchased HEXY tokens?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: Simply connect your wallet to the payment widget on our website, and your purchased $HEXY tokens will be displayed instantly. Make sure you're using the correct wallet and network for seamless access.

FAQ_SUMMARY.QUESTION: How can I purchase with card?
FAQ_SUMMARY.ANSWER: Click on MoonPay or ChangeNow on our website to buy crypto from our multi-chain options using your card. Then, connect your wallet and use the purchased crypto to buy $HEXY tokens.
